testcase.name: SN3 user tests that it is not possible to log in with the wrong mail and password.
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url "autoUrl".............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And wait 1 second...........................................................passed And Click on SignupLogin button.............................................passed And Verify Login to your account is visible.................................passed And wait 1 second...........................................................passed And Enter incorrect email address and password..............................passed And wait 1 second...........................................................passed And Click login button......................................................passed And wait 1 second...........................................................passed And Verify error Your email or password is incorrect is visible.............passed
